opennlp.ccgbank
Class CCGBankTaskFileGroup<G>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      org.apache.tools.ant.Task
          opennlp.ccgbank.CCGBankTaskFileGroup<G>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Iterable<File>, org.apache.tools.ant.TaskContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CCGBankTaskSources, CCGBankTaskTemplates
public abstract class CCGBankTaskFileGroup<G>
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task
implements org.apache.tools.ant.TaskContainer, Iterable<File>

Abstract class providing generalized functionality for file groups used by CCGBankTasks.

For convenience, this class implements Iterable over Files. This allows instances to be used in standard iteration constructs while abstracting away from implementation details such as multiple FileSets or FileLists.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Scott Martin

Method Detail

addGroup

protected void addGroup(G group)
Adds a subgroup to the collection of subgroups this class abstracts over.

getFiles

protected abstract File[] getFiles(G group)
Gets all the files in a group as an array. To be implemented by extending classes, as FileSet and FileList represent files differently.

Returns:
The collection of files in group, as an array.

makeFiles

protected File[] makeFiles(File directory,
                           String[] fileNames)
Creates an array of files given a directory and an array of file names (specified relative to that directory).

Parameters:
directory - The directory that the specified file names are relative to.
fileNames - The file names, relative to the specified directory.
Returns:
An array containing all the files as specified relative to the specified directory.

addTask

public void addTask(org.apache.tools.ant.Task task)
Included for binary compatibility with TaskContainer.

Specified by:
addTask in interface org.apache.tools.ant.TaskContainer
Throws:
org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException - Always throws a build exception, as only the parameterized type of this class's subgroups can be contained by this task.

iterator

public Iterator<File> iterator()
Provides an iterator over all the files in the collection of subgroups contained by this instance. The iterator returned will iterate through files in all the subgroups returned in the same order as the order returned by the subgroups collection.

Specified by:
iterator in interface Iterable<File>
